title: I'm a Servant to These Small Succubi
description:
Cute Loli Succubi
Chapter 1 is not 'complete', as some pages were cut out from the original doujin when it was added to the tankoubon release. Check out the related doujin for those pages.

[url=https://exhentai.org/g/1576433/439b667c23/][img]https://i.fiery.me/taLcD.png[/img]
Note: MangaDex still doesn't have downscaling, so you can view it on sadpanda if load times are an issue for you(400MB -> 100MB).[/url]

related.title: I'm a Servant to These Small Succubi
